attributes.title: Terrible 🤪
attributes.review: Ew the app made my phone get a virus, and said if I didn’t donate to trump, I would have to join the blue whale challenge 😖🥺

attributes.title: This app is HORRENDOUS
attributes.review: This app gave me so many different diseases that I can’t even lost them all. 🤢🤢gross app💩💩💩it’s very bad and it took me weeks to download it😡😡DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!!😡😡😡😡😡💩💩❌❌❌❌

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: there were so many issues with this app including being a racist, homophobic, all around terrible app. very disappointed i hope when apple comes together in september they will vote to get it removed.

attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: The app was at first fishy.... then it started to lag on the home screen and I got mad af🤬. I wanted to go to a rally I got tickets and THE APP REMOVED THEM🤬. Disappointed 🙄

attributes.title: Disgusting— delete this
attributes.review: This app made my stomach physically hurt. Delete this from the App Store and spare others from its horrific, upsetting existence.

attributes.title: 1 star
